alert.note: Alert for Caldwell (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued April 05 at 10:36PM CDT by NWS Austin-San Antonio
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of southwestern Caldwell, Guadalupe, northwestern Gonzales and north central Wilson Counties through 1115 PM CDT... At 1036 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from near New Berlin to near Sutherland Springs. Movement was northeast at 45 mph. HAZARD...Penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Seguin, Lockhart, Luling, McQueeney, La Vernia, Kingsbury, New Berlin, Staples, Fentress, Palmeto State Park, Sutherland Springs, Geronimo, Brownsboro, Nolte, Joliet, Zipp, Stairtown, Belmont, McNeil and Ottine. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN MAX WIND GUST...<30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. These storms may intensify, so be certain to monitor local radio stations and available television stations for additional information and possible warnings from the National Weather Service.
